required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: The Safety and Efficacy of Multiple-dose of JS004 in Subject With HNC
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase I/II Clinical Study of JS004, a Recombinant Humanized mAb Specific to B-and T-Lymphocyte Attenuator (BTLA), in Subjects With Head and Neck Cancer

brief_summary.textblock: A phase I/II clinical study of JS004 in subjects with head and neck cancer in China, to evaluate the safety, tolerability, PK, immunogenicity, antitumor activity and biomarkers of JS004, define the MTD and RP2D. A cycle is 21 days (3 weeks) which includes JS004 being administered IV Q3W. All patients will be treated until disease progression per RECIST v1.1 and iRECIST, or intolerable toxicity per CTCAE 5.0, withdrawal of consent, or end of the study, whichever occurs first.Disease progression must be confirmed at least 4 weeks but no longer than 8 weeks after initial documentation of progression.

primary_outcome.measure: The incidence of adverse events (AE) and serious adverse events (SAE) were assessed
primary_outcome.description: Incidence and severity of adverse events (AE) and serious adverse events (SAE) as assessed according to NCI-CTCAE 5.0, as well as abnormalities in vital signs, electrocardiogram, and laboratory tests
Objective Response Rate(ORR) evaluated according to RECIST 1.1

secondary_outcome.measure: Phase II Recommended Dose of JS004 (RP2D)
secondary_outcome.description: Phase II Recommended Dose of JS004 (RP2D)
the rate of Anti-drug body (ADA) and neutralizing antibody (Nab)
Maximum Plasma Concentration(Cmax) after injection of JS004
Progression-free survival evaluated according to RECIST 1.1

other_outcome.description: Predictive biomarkers, including but not limited to, BTLA and HVEM
trough Plasma Concentration (Ctrough) after injection of JS004
Perk Time(Tmax) after injection of JS004
Area Under the Cure(AUC) after injection of JS004
Plasma Clearence(CL) after injection of JS004

other_outcome.measure: volume of distribution of steady state(Vss)
other_outcome.description: volume of distribution of steady state(Vss) after multiple dose injection of JS004

clinical_study.condition: Head and Neck Squamous Cell Carcinom

intervention.intervention_name: JS004 , Recombinant humanized IgG4k monoclonal antibody specific to BTLA for injection Intravenous infusion
intervention.description: 200mg:JS004 , Recombinant humanized IgG4k monoclonal antibody specific to BTLA for injection Intravenous infusion

intervention.description: 600mg:JS004 , Recombinant humanized IgG4k monoclonal antibody specific to BTLA for injection Intravenous infusion
